**Instructions**
Level of happines is measure by the number of positive or negative comments you have. 

1. In the input text describe how was your day, adding emotions like "good,bad" will increase or lower the score.  
2. There are some options that will tweak your score in a positive way, you can select one or more.
3. CLick on the "Reveal your Score button"   


<50% needs some changes, >50%  and <100% Normal day, >100% Excellent day
